title: A Close Call for Boston Blackie

sources.title: A Close Call for Boston Blackie
sources.description: A Close Call for Boston Blackie (1946) is the tenth of fourteen Columbia Pictures crime films starring Chester Morris as Boston Blackie. Cast Chester Morris as Boston Blackie Lynn Merrick as Geraldine "Gerry" Peyton Richard Lane as Inspector Farraday Frank Sully as Sergeant Matthews George E. Stone as "The Runt" from imdb Enjoyable Blackie entry with ample laughs, no big surprises 24 September 2011 | by csteidler (Minnesota) Blackie and the Runt rescue a woman (Lynn Merrick) who's been attacked in the street right in front of their building. They carry in the unconscious woman, who is quickly identified as Gerry Peyton, one of Blackie's old flames. Nothing much new so far, but when they open the bedroom door we see the main twist that this series entry has to offer: a baby!

sources.title: A CLOSE CALL FOR BOSTON BLACKIE (1946)
sources.description: Boston Blackie, a criminal turned detective, must clear his name after he is accused of murder.

metadata.Plot: Sleuth Blackie is framed for murder but manages to catch the culprit.
metadata.Writer: Ben Markson, Paul Yawitz, Malcolm Stuart Boylan
metadata.Actors: Chester Morris, Lynn Merrick, Richard Lane
